abstract: "Captors," play about Eichmann, has eye on Broadway after Boston world premiere.
snippet: "Captors," play about Eichmann, has eye on Broadway after Boston world premiere.
lead_paragraph: The respected character actor Michael Cristofer will play Adolf Eichmann, locked in a battle of wills and wits with Mossad agents in 1960 Buenos Aires, in the new drama "Captors" at the Huntington Theater Company this fall, the company said on Tuesday. An outside team of commercial producers has already secured the rights to transfer the work to Broadway, which they hope to do during the 2011-12 season after the end of the Huntington run, a spokeswoman for the theater added.

headline.main: Eichmann Drama Opening in Boston, With Broadway in Mind
